title: Data Cellar Participant Template
description: A repository containing all the essential components needed to set up a Data Cellar participant, including a web server for hosting verifiable credentials, a participant wallet, the Data Cellar data space connector (based on the EDC connector codebase), and the Data Cellar CDE.
notes: This template provides a complete setup for participating in the Data Cellar data space, including all necessary infrastructure components such as EDC connector, wallet services, credentials manager, and web UI components.
